CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: Low-band-gap polymers for bulk - heterojunction (BHJ)-type polymer solar cells ( PSCs ) have been studied intensively with the aim of matching a greater part of the solar spectrum and thus harvesting more photon flux , to produce efficiencies greater than 7-9 % .

Let's think step by step.

Sure! Here are the "Material Name" entities in the paragraph:

1. Low-band-gap polymers
2. Bulk - heterojunction (BHJ) -type polymer solar cells (PSCs)

So, the two material names mentioned in the paragraph are:

1. Low-band-gap polymers
2. BHJ-type polymer solar cells (PSCs)
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Name.

Of course! Here are the material names mentioned in the paragraph after removing the irrelevant entities:

1. Low-band-gap polymers
2. BHJ-type polymer solar cells (PSCs)

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Certainly! Here are the material names mentioned in the paragraph, presented in a Markdown table with one column titled "Material Name":

| Material Name |
| --- |
| Low-band-gap polymers |
| BHJ-type polymer solar cells (PSCs) |

I hope this helps! Let me know if you have any further questions.

* Photon flux (this refers to a quantity of light)

PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: Low-band-gap polymers for bulk - heterojunction (BHJ)-type polymer solar cells ( PSCs ) have been studied intensively with the aim of matching a greater part of the solar spectrum and thus harvesting more photon flux , to produce efficiencies greater than 7-9 % .

Let's think step by step.

Sure! Here are the "Property Value" entities in the given paragraph:

1. Band gap: This is a property of the polymers being studied, which refers to the energy range of electromagnetic radiation that the polymers can absorb and convert into electrical energy.
2. Efficiency: This is another property of the polymers, which refers to the percentage of incoming solar energy that is converted into electrical energy by the solar cell.
3. Photon flux: This is a measure of the number of photons (light particles) that reach the solar cell per unit area per unit time.

So, the "Property Value" entities in the paragraph are:

1. Band gap
2. Efficiency
3. Photon flux
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Value of Material Property.

Of course! Here are the "Property Value" entities in the paragraph that clearly refer to the value of material properties:

1. Band gap: This is a property of the polymers being studied, which refers to the energy range of electromagnetic radiation that the polymers can absorb and convert into electrical energy.
2. Efficiency: This is another property of the polymers, which refers to the percentage of incoming solar energy that is converted into electrical energy by the solar cell.

I hope this helps! Let me know if you have any further questions.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Certainly! Here are the valid "Property Value" entities in the paragraph, presented in a Markdown table:

| Property Value |
| --- |
| Band gap |
| Efficiency |

I hope this helps! Let me know if you have any further questions.
